entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 28, 04:00 - 18:00 UTC

Feb 20, 14:23 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out maintenance on our cooling infrastructure.

Start time : 28/04/2025 04:00 UTC
End time : 28/04/2025 18:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in this rack will be unavailable for a maximum of 12 hours.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some cooling system replacement and upgrade.

The maintenance may be completed in less time than expected, and we are committed to minimizing the outage duration.
Thank you for your understanding.

Jan 29, 13:18 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

This will affect availability of your servers.

Start time : 20/03/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 21/03/2025 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers will be unavailable during the maintenance operation.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our products and services, we will carry out an electrical upgrade in our Graveline Datacenters. To protect your data from any impact, we advise you to first restart your machines in rescue mode (How to activate and use rescue mode) before the operation mentioned above.

Every client concerned by this maintenance will be contacted.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [GRA][Backbone] - Upgrade of network infrastrucure
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 19, 22:00 UTC  -  Mar 20, 05:00 UTC

Feb 28, 16:18 UTC
Scheduled - As part of the continuous improvement of our services, we have planned an evolution of the network infrastructure on the Gravelines site on March 19, 2025.

Start time : 19/03/2025 22:00 UTC
End time : 20/03/2025 05:00 UTC
Service impact : Some network perturbation can be observe during the 3rd step for a duration of 5 to 10 min
Service improvement : Network scaling capacity

This maintenance will be structured around three phases, described in detail below:

Step 1 : preparation of the maintenance operation (about 2 hours)
Step 2 : implementation of the new infrastructure (about 3 hours)
Step 3 : test and activation of the new infrastructure (about3 hours)

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding as we work to improve our services.

Thank you for your understanding.
